text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Who didn’t see THIS coming!! Every single time he says something stupid, he sees ppl making fun of him and tries to excuse it away. He should S T F U!!! Unstable idiot. I’m surprised he can ties his own shoes! #TrumpDisinfectant #TrumpIsALaughingStock 

https://t.co/AmnnYxjNM4
